slides.title: Premium interior design
slides.description: Saying "luxury" we reveal the total perception of the interior: visual, tactile, intuitive.

slides.title: FF&E DESIGN
slides.description: Noble furniture, works of art, functional and aesthetically perfect decors that do not conflict in shape and colour, but complement each other, all these details perform space de luxe

slides.title: 22 Carat
slides.description: XXII Carat Club Villas is a private residential area with 200 meter long beach and 22 villas placed on Palm Jumeirah island, close to the hotels One&Only the Palm and Jumeirah Zabeel Saray.
